questions.question: According to Millman’s Theorem, if there are n voltage sources with n internal resistances respectively, are in parallel, then these sources are replaced by?

answers.a: single current source I’ in series with R’
answers.b: single voltage source V’ in series with R’
answers.c: single current source I’ in parallel to R’
answers.d: single voltage source V’ in parallel to R’

questions.question: According to Millman’s Theorem, if there are n current sources with n internal conductances respectively, are in series, then these sources are replaced by?

answers.a: single voltage source V’ in parallel with G’
answers.b: single current source I’ in series with G’
answers.c: single current source I’ in parallel with G’
answers.d: single voltage source V’ in series with G’
